dataList.name: Puffy Brume
dataList.desc: Instead of taking more damage due to <sprite name="Smoke"><color=#e30000><u><link="Smoke">Дым</link></u></color> on self, inflict more damage.

dataList.name: Meat Gear
dataList.desc: The first Coin to connect in an Encounter deals +10% more damage

dataList.name: Thought Gear
dataList.desc: On Evade Skill Use: Base Power +1

dataList.name: Internal Combustion Engine Malfunction
dataList.desc: When Staggered, lose all <sprite name="Smoke"><color=#e30000><u><link="Smoke">Дым</link></u></color> on self

dataList.name: Meat Gear: Enhance
dataList.desc:
If there are other surviving allies, apply 1 <sprite name="ParryingResultUp"><color=#f8c200><u><link="ParryingResultUp">Повышение силы в поединке</link></u></color> and 2 <sprite name="AttackDmgUp"><color=#f8c200><u><link="AttackDmgUp">Повышение урона</link></u></color> to all allies (2 times for each ally)
If ther eare no other surviving allies, gain 8 <sprite name="Smoke"><color=#e30000><u><link="Smoke">Дым</link></u></color> at Turn Start

dataList.name: Thought Gear: Delay
dataList.desc: If this unit is alive, no enemies are generated at Turn End.

dataList.name: Thought Gear: Risk
dataList.desc: On Defensive Skill Use: Defensive Skill Base Power +1
